name: National Anthem of Ukraine
generalDescription: The coin is dedicated to the National symbol and is issued to mark 140th anniversary of the first public performance of the National Anthem of Ukraine made to music of M.Verbytsky (1815 – 1870) and to poetry of P.Chubynsky (1839 – 1884).
averseDescription: On the coin obverse against the background of the conventionalized National Flag of Ukraine there is a depiction of the first lines of the National Anthem of Ukraine: ` Still has not died the glory and liberty of Ukraine`, above there is the small National Emblem of Ukraine, as well as the inscriptions: УКРАЇНА (Ukraine) (above and in semicircle), 10 ГРИВЕНЬ/ 2005 (10/ hryvnia/ 2005) (beneath), as well as Ag 925, the designation of metal and 31,1, its weight in fineness). On the coin there is also a depiction of the Mint logoTYPE of the National Bank of Ukraine.
reverseDescription: On the coin reverse there is the spiral inscription: СТО СОРОКОВА РІЧНИЦЯ З ЧАСУ ПЕРШОГО ПУБЛІЧНОГО ВИКОНАННЯ НАЦІОНАЛЬНОГО ГІМНУ УКРАЇНИ АВТОР МЕЛОДІЇ - МИХАЙЛО ВЕРБИЦЬКИЙ (1815 - 1870) АВТОР СЛІВ - ПАВЛО ЧУБИНСЬКИЙ (1839 - 1884) (140th anniversary of the first public performance of the National Anthem of Ukraine/ to music of M.Verbytsky (1815 - 1870/ to poetry of P.Chubynsky (1839 - 1884). In the middle of this inscription (in the centre of the coin) there is the holographic depiction of a conventionalized flower
